properties.areaDesc: Dent, MO; Pulaski, MO; Maries, MO; Miller, MO; Phelps, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:54PM CST until January 11 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Maries County in central Missouri...
Dent County in south central Missouri...
Southeastern Miller County in central Missouri...
Eastern Pulaski County in central Missouri...
Phelps County in east central Missouri...

* Until 1100 AM CST Saturday.

* At 1054 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain which will cause flooding. Up to one inch of rain has
already fallen.

* Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the warning include...
Rolla...                          Eastern Fort Leonard Wood...
Ozark National Scenic Riverways...
Montauk State Park...
Salem...                          St. James...
Belle...                          Doolittle...
Vienna...                         Newburg...
Bunker...                         Edgar Springs...
Lenox...                          Montauk...
Jadwin...                         Beulah...
Howes Mill...                     Lake Spring...
Gladden...                        Anutt...

This warning includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Route N at The Maries River east of Brinktown...
Route Y northwest of Rolla...
Route K at Atwell Creek 5 miles southeast of Iberia...
Highway 119 at Pigeon Creek near Montauk State Park...
and Route DD at Dry Fork northwest of Salem.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are
potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded
roads. Find an alternate route.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
